greatsword.name: Wind-up Slash
greatsword.note:
Can be released immediately or charged up to 2 extra levels before releasing. 
 Charge can be canceled into a Tackle.

greatsword.name: Strong Wind-up Slash
greatsword.note:
Can be released immediately or charged up to 2 extra levels before releasing. 
 Charge can be canceled into a Tackle.

greatsword.name: True Wind-up Slash I
greatsword.note: Can be released immediately or charged up to 2 extra levels before releasing.

greatsword.name: True Wind-up Slash II
greatsword.note:
Inherits it's charge level from True Wind-up Slash I. 
 If True Wind-up Slash I hit a weak point this attack does extra damage.

greatsword.name: Tackle
greatsword.note:
Halves incoming damage until the end of the round. 
 Inherits charge level from Wind-up attack.

greatsword.name: Guard
greatsword.note:
Halves incoming damage and adds knockback immunity to attacks from directly in front of the hunter.
 -4 Stamina when blocking a hit. 
 No Stamina recovery

hammer.name: Charge I
hammer.note:
Increases Charge Level by 1 

 Charge level resets at the end of the combo.

hammer.name: Charge II
hammer.note:
Increases Charge Level by 1 

 Charge level resets at the end of the combo.

hammer.name: Power Charge
hammer.note: Activates Power Charge until knocked down or the weapon is sheathed.

hammer.name: Big Bang I
hammer.note: Cancel combo and enter Recovery if it misses

hammer.name: Big Bang II
hammer.note: Cancel combo and enter Recovery if it misses

hammer.name: Big Bang III
hammer.note: Cancel combo and enter Recovery if it misses

hammer.name: Big Bang IV
hammer.note: Cancel combo and enter Recovery if it misses

hammer.name: Charged Spinning Bludgeon I
hammer.note: Move up to your full movement speed while performing this move.

hammer.name: Charged Spinning Bludgeon II
hammer.note: Move up to your full movement speed while performing this move.

hammer.name: Charged Spinning Bludgeon III
hammer.note: Move up to your full movement speed while performing this move.

hammer.name: Charged Spinning Bludgeon IV
hammer.note: Move up to your full movement speed while performing this move.

dualblade.name: Fade Slash
dualblade.note: Demon Mode Only. attack and movement must be in the same direction. Either left or right.

dualblade.name: Heavenly Blade Dance
dualblade.note: Demon Mode Only. If the first hit connects with a target the attack continues in a straight line across the target, dealing the same amount of damage to each hex it makes contact with.

dualblade.name: Double Slash
dualblade.note: Only available while not in Demon Mode

dualblade.name: Turn Slash
dualblade.note: Only available while not in Demon Mode

dualblade.name: Double Slash Return Stroke
dualblade.note: Only available while not in Demon Mode

dualblade.name: Circle Slash I
dualblade.note: Only available while not in Demon Mode

dualblade.name: Circle Slash II
dualblade.note: Only available while not in Demon Mode

dualblade.name: Lunging Strike I
dualblade.note: Only available while not in Demon Mode. Movement and attack must be in the same direction. either left or right.

dualblade.name: Lunging Strike II
dualblade.note: Only available while not in Demon Mode. Movement and attack must be in the same direction. either left or right.

dualblade.name: Left Roundslash
dualblade.note: Only available while not in Demon Mode

bow.name: Draw
bow.note:
Half Unsheathed movement (rounded down to the nearest 5ft) while Drawing. 

 Increases Draw Level by 1

bow.name: Arc Shot
bow.note: Draw Levels 1 and 2 last for 3 rounds, Level 3 lasts for 5 rounds.

bow.name: Dragon Piercer
bow.note: Pierces the target allowing it to hit multiple times for each hex passed through.

longsword.name: Thrust
longsword.note: Can be chained inbetween Spirit Slash Combos. cannot be used to exit or enter the Spirit Slash combo.

longsword.name: Fade Slash
longsword.note: Attack lands at the beginning of next round, usable after any other attack as a valid combo move

longsword.name: Foresight Slash
longsword.note: I frames for first round, Max Soul Gauge if an attack was dodged and the attack hits a target

longsword.name: Spirit Helmbreaker
longsword.note: gain 5 Soul Gauge per round for 5 rounds if it hits a valid target

longsword.name: Iai Slash
longsword.note: I-frames for first round, Can still be shoved, gain 5 Soul Gauge per round for 5 rounds if it hits a valid target

longsword.name: Iai Spirit Slash
longsword.note: I-frames for first round, Can still be shoved, consume 1 Soul Level if an attack is not dodged, Move user 15ft forward through any creature

longsword.name: Iai Sheathe
longsword.note: Special sheathe action that allows Iai Slashes as follow-ups
